title: Skarner buged quotes
body: Battlecast Alpha skin is half of the time saying quotes from the classic skin.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working to resolve it. ^0^
And while u are at it, change back his altars cirlce lines, they were just fine but now u made them almost invisible
While you're here, any info on why Stashu disappeared in regards to the Vlad update? His communication was great at first, and disappeared entirely a week ago. :/
Not sure, tbh. I can poke him.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=JiQleIO9,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-29T18:06:06.203+0000)
>
> Not sure, tbh. I can poke him.

That would be great! 

While the rework is really close to being good (especially thematically), it did nothing to fix his usability issues that he's always had. Since he was made less reliable, he's going to be at a point where he has to be OP in order to be worth using.

Changing how his MS buff on Q works, or even adding a slow to his ult cast, or anything similar would help him enable his own kit so his numbers aren't effectively required to be too high or too low for him to be healthy, like even the current rework iteration. :)

I just don't want him to be rolled as is because he'll either be buffed to the point where he's usable (OP), or nerfed to the point where he's not over-bearing (way too unreliable to warrant picking). 

Its nerve wracking to watch him sit in his current state without any response from Stashu!
